label: Women's Brands
description: With a history stretching back more than 60 years, adidas needs no introduction. Rooted in sport, the adidas Performance range delivers on both tech and style with sweat-wicking leggings, vests and sports bras. Bringing back retro streetwear, adidas Originals serves up fresh, vintage-inspired looks across a selection of T-shirts, sweatshirts, tracksuits and trainers â€“ think everything from iconic Superstars and Stan Smiths to Gazelles and Continental 80s. Check out the adidas at ASOS edit to scroll some of our favourite pieces from the brand with the 3-Stripes. Classic streetwear vibes, incoming.
